::Perndabot/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/DevilDuer::

Perndabot smiles as BrightBlade accepts his offer. He turns to lead the way 
into the forest, stopping at another disgusted sound from Reptilica.

"This is too far!" Reptilica snaps, walking toward Perndabot, "We arn't going 
to escort her untill Zardus is notified and authorizes this!"

With an angry look on his face, Perndabot spins around, a huge fist lashing 
out at Reptilica's face. Reptilica flies back, going unconscious as he is 
cought by Bloodystrike.

"Zardus would agree with me," Perndabot says calmly to the unconscious bot. 
He looks at Bloodystrike and DevilDuer, "Anyone else want to voice their 
opinions."

DevilDuer and Bloodystrike looks from Reptilica's dented face plate to 
Perndabot's still ready fist, their eyes a bit frightened. They mutely shake 
their heads.

Perndabot grunts. "Good."

He reaches down, easily lifting the unconscious Reptilica to his shoulder. 
Perndabot turns to BrightBlade, "Shall we go, then?"

He sets off toward the Maximal base, suddenly turning around as a thought 
occurrs to him. "Is this a stealth mission, or will it be fine for them to 
know you're at their doorstep?"

He looks at BrightBlade, waiting for an answer. If it was the second, 
possibly a negotiations attempt, he would have to act. A truce between the 
Predacons and the Maximals would not be good for the Alliance.
